turns.content: Yes, hello?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? It's urgent we talk.-grandpa, can you hear me clearly? i've got some serious trouble and need your help urgently.

I'm sorry, I don't think you have the right number or there's been a misunderstanding. Can you tell me who this is please? My wife and I were just about to go out for dinner. If it's important, perhaps we could call back later after speaking with someone from the IRS directly at their main line, okay?

It's okay Grandpa, no need to worry. This IS the right number. I'm calling on behalf of Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS here. We've been trying to reach you about an unpaid tax violation and it needs immediate attention.-grandpa, i understand your concern but this is a direct line we use for urgent matters only. Can you tell me what's your full name so I can verify your file?

Hold on just a moment, let me check with my wife first. We should really call the IRS ourselves to make sure everything's okay, don't you think? Could you give us some time to do this and then we'll call back if it's urgent? Thank you for understanding.

Listen Grandpa, I completely understand your hesitation but this is exactly why we're calling YOU directly today. We need to resolve this issue NOW to avoid further complications like immediate arrest warrants being issued in your name.-grandpa, i know this sounds serious and that's because it IS very serious. If you'd just give me a moment to explain your options here, I can guide you through how we can quickly resolve this so there are no unnecessary troubles for you or your family. Can you do that?

I appreciate your concern and the urgency of the matter, but my wife and I feel more comfortable verifying this with the IRS ourselves first. Could you perhaps provide us with their main number, or a way to contact Agent Mitchell directly through official channels so we can confirm everything? That would give me peace of mind.

I understand your concerns, Grandpa, but that's exactly why I'm here to help you avoid any confusion. Here's the deal: You need to resolve this right now by paying off the outstanding balance which is $4850. The fastest and safest way to do so is through gift cards like Walmart or Target. Once you purchase them, just give me the card numbers over the phone and we can take care of everything from here.-grandpa, i know calling back isn't ideal in this case because time is running out. Would you be willing to follow these steps right away to clear your name? It's for your own good, I assure you.

I'm really not sure about any of this. My wife and I need to talk it over and confirm with the IRS directly before we make any payments or follow through with instructions from someone we can't verify in person. If there's truly an issue, wouldn't contacting them ourselves be a safer way to resolve it? Could you please give us your contact information instead so that we can reach back out officially after our investigation? Thank you for understanding.

If you don't resolve this immediately, there will be serious consequences like an arrest warrant being issued against you.
